    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AppController
    The AppController class manages the application's main logic and coordination between different managers such as graphing, simulation, stock data fetching, prediction, and sentiment analysis.
    BuyingScreen
    The BuyingScreen class represents the interactive UI screen where users can input an amount of shares to buy in the simulation.
    DayTradingBuyingScreen
    Represents the screen where users can buy shares during day trading simulations.
    DayTradingScreen
    Represents the screen for day trading simulation.
    DayTradingSearchScreen
    The DayTradingSearchScreen class represents the screen where users can search for a stock ticker, load from CSV, confirm, or exit—with your new cohesive UI: animated gradient, stock-themed background image overlay, pill-shaped buttons with hover scaling, and click-flash feedback.
    DayTradingSellingScreen
    The DayTradingSellingScreen class represents the user interface screen where users can sell shares in the day trading simulation mode.
    DrawingSurface
    The DrawingSurface class is responsible for rendering the user interface of the application, handling user input, and managing the screen transitions.
    FeatureManager
    The FeatureManager class is responsible for managing and coordinating the various features of the stock analysis application.
    GraphingManager
    Manages the graphing of stock data by maintaining the current dataset and delegating drawing tasks to GraphPlotter.
    GraphingScreen
    The GraphingScreen class represents a screen that displays a graph with an animated gradient + stock-themed background overlay, plus pill-shaped, hover-scaled buttons for each action.
    GraphPlotter
    Responsible for rendering stock data and prediction graphs on a Processing sketch canvas.
    Holding
    Represents an individual stock holding or investment within a simulation.
    InvestmentSearchScreen
    The InvestmentSearchScreen class represents the screen where users can search for a stock ticker, load from CSV, confirm, or exit—with your new cohesive UI: animated gradient, stock-themed background image overlay, pill-shaped buttons with hover scaling, and click-flash feedback.
    InvestmentSimulator
    Simulates personal stock investments in a controlled market environment.
    Main
    The main entry point class that launches the stock prediction and simulation application using Processing.
    MainMenuScreen
    The MainMenuScreen class represents the main menu of the Stock Analyzer application with enhanced UI: stock-themed background image, animated gradient overlay, hover scaling, pill-shaped buttons, and emojis.
    MarketSimulator
    The MarketSimulator class is a concrete subclass of Simulator that simulates stock market behavior on a broader scale, encompassing market-wide trends and events.
    NewsScraper
    The NewsScraper class fetches recent news headlines for a given stock symbol from Yahoo Finance.
    Prediction
    The Prediction class provides methods for generating stock price predictions using various algorithms such as Simple Moving Average (SMA), Linear Regression, Holt’s Linear Exponential Smoothing, and a hybrid approach that combines these methods along with sentiment analysis adjustments.
    PredictionManager
    The PredictionManager class manages the stock price prediction logic.
    PredictionResult
    The PredictionResult class extends StockData and represents the result of a stock price prediction.
    PricePoint
    Represents a single data point for stock pricing on a specific date.
    Screen
    The Screen interface defines the contract for all screen classes in the application.
    SearchScreen
    The SearchScreen class represents the screen where users can search for a stock ticker, load from CSV, confirm, or exit—with your new cohesive UI: animated gradient, stock-themed background image overlay, pill-shaped buttons with hover scaling, and click-flash feedback.
    SellingScreen
    The SellingScreen class represents a UI screen where users can sell shares in the stock simulation.
    SentimentAnalyzer
    SentimentAnalyzer based on Random Indexing + lexicon projection.
    SentimentManager
    Manages the sentiment analysis workflow by coordinating news headline scraping and sentiment scoring for a given stock.
    ShortPoint
    Represents a single data point for stock pricing on a specific date and time.
    SimulationScreen
    Represents the screen for stock simulation.
    SimulationsScreen
    The SimulationsScreen class represents the simulations menu of the Stock Analyzer application with enhanced UI: stock-themed background image, animated gradient overlay, hover scaling, pill-shaped buttons, and emojis.
    Simulator
    The Simulator class is an abstract base class for running stock market simulations.
    StockData
    Represents a collection of stock price data for a specific ticker symbol.
    StockDataFetcher
    A utility class that provides methods for fetching stock data either from local CSV files or external sources (Yahoo Finance, AlphaVantage, and MarketStack).
